response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily routine or professional endeavors. Given its high quality and unique features, I think it's worth more than the average market price. Considering its value, I'm offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits we're providing to you. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of convenience, efficiency, and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 150}
